author: manuel_m_carreira_s_j
post: To Maria da Gloria: I belong to the CES (Centro Español de Sindonología) and EDICES (the branch working on the study of the Oviedo Sudarium). As a group, we would like to have contacts with the Center in Portugal. And as a long time student of the Shroud (and lecturer at several Congresses, in Spain, Peru and Rome) I would be glad to share some writings on the subject. My e mail: ecarreira@res.upcomillas.es With my best regards and Happy New Year 2011. Manuel M. Carreira, S.J. From Madrid.
title: Is the Shroud of Turin a Fake?
